summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; ratifying and confirming the execution of contracts by the Director of Engineering with consultants and contractors to design and install underground gas migration control systems in areas near Midway Landfill; authorizing the Director of Engineering to enter into agreements with property owners near Midway Landfill for installation of gas control systems; and making an appropriation from the Solid Waste Fund to Supplement earlier funds appropriated by Ordinance No. 112415 and No. 112600.
